channel.title: Shops and stuff
channel.description: I added like 10 shops in my auto spawn and in my shops.cfg files and they spawned and everythings right expect, when i trade them, it dis connects me, and i know i gotta add somting to java. but i need help, if you need the autospawn and shops.cfg and stuff, ill put it here. please help! Ill pay r.s cash if you do.

hmm…

try this, i added obby shop, ignore quotes

} else if (NPCID == 553) { //Aubury rune shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 2; //Aubury Magic Shop "} else if (NPCID == 569) { //Silver Merchant Obby Shopkeeper PutNPCCoords = true; "WanneShop = 42"; //Obsidian Shop"
